power.title: Agonizing Assault
power.fluff: Your attack hits your adversary in a sensitive area, causing it to reel in pain

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is in pain (save ends).

section.name: Flail:
section.text: The target is also knocked prone.
While it is in pain, the target is both dazed and immobilized.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Flail:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Bare-Knuckled Rebuke
power.fluff: Your enemies leave themselves open to your powerful punches when they miss with their attacks

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Bare-Knuckled Rebuke stance.
While in the stance, you can use the Rebuke Punch attack at-will.

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must have a hand free.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy within your unarmed reach misses you with a melee attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering enemy

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC (unarmed)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (unarmed) + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the start of its next turn.

power.title: Bedeviling Assault
power.fluff: While your ally distracts your opponent, you attempt to land yet another blow

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You gain a +4 bonus to the first triggered attack roll you make against the target before the end of the encounter.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, once per round when an ally hits the target with a melee attack, you can make a melee basic attack with combat advantage against the target as a free reaction.

power.title: Brazen Assault
power.fluff: Relying on your own resilience, you put yourself in danger, knowing that you can maneuver for a better attack

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Endurance.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is pushed 2 squares.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain resist to all damage equal to 5 + one-half the number of healing surges you have expended, but grant combat advantage to all attacks. This lasts until the end of the encounter. You can end this effect as a free action during your turn, but not on the same turn that you activated it.

power.title: Brutal Advance
power.fluff: After throwing your enemy back, you charge to deliver the killing blow

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You push the target 3 squares, and then charge it.
If this charge attack hits, the target falls prone.

power.title: Cometfall Charge
power.fluff: You leap through the air toward your foe, landing with a resounding crunch

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Athletics.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You charge and use this attack in place of a melee basic attack. If an effect allows you to charge, you can use this power.
During the charge movement, you must make an Athletics check to long jump. You are considered to have a running start for this jump.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC
If you end the jump in reach of the target, you can score a critical hit on a natural roll of 19 or 20
For each square beyond 2 you jumped, you gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage.
If you jumped down from higher elevation during the charge, the attack deals an additional +1[W] damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Crack the Shell
power.fluff: Seeing an opportunity, you strike your foe hard and fast, delivering a painful bleeding wound that hampers its defenses

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is painfully bleeding (save ends).
While it is bleeding, the target takes ongoing 5 damage and a -2 penalty to AC and Reflex.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target has a -2 penalty to AC against the first attack targeting AC made against it before the end of your next turn, and you regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.
